text: ovun oba atare pæmina sitiyehu nam, avinitava hæsirenava misa, (vena kisima hondak) ovun obata vædi kara harinne næta. napura adahas karamin oba atare avalaksanayada æti karannata ida tibuni. ovunta (ovunge napuru vadan valata) savan dennanda obagen bohomayak dena sitinnaha. namut allah mevæni aparadhakaruvanva hondin danneya
